title: @ Riot can you throw us a bone on who the next vgus after Nunu are. I just want this answered
body: Is one of the two vgus you mentioned completely out of the left field. I mean someone that was not talked about or hinted out in your tier charts

replies.body: Yes

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-07-11T02:57:26.466+0000)
>
> Yes

holy shit

this rammus VGU is going to rework his vocabulary!
NnNnNNNnNoooOOOOoooOk

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-07-11T02:57:26.466+0000)
>
> Yes

It's Aatrox *again*, isn't it? Not because he's bad (I love the new Aatrox), but because that WOULD be completely out of left field.

> [{quoted}](name=The Djinn,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2018-07-11T03:44:20.880+0000)
>
> It's Aatrox *again*, isn't it? Not because he's bad (I love the new Aatrox), but because that WOULD be completely out of left field.

nah bro. it's lux.
Nah Ryze is getting his yearly rework.

"Early rework for Ryze!"
Semicit.
Gangplank dying and getting a new base skin happened, but getting a new kit would be next level.

Will it be Kayle? Please tell me it's Kayle, her kit is way too outdated and I'm way too excited to see what you guys can do with her 'sword-weilding warrior angel' archetype. Besides, I'm guessing it was teased with the amount of voice lines Aatrox has about her. Am I on the right track? Knock once for yes, knock twice for no.
Oh boy

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-07-11T02:57:26.466+0000)
>
> Yes

Morgana it is then!?!?
of Reav3 you sly dog
VOLIBEAR !! VOLIBEAR !! RAWRR !! {{champion:106}}

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-07-11T02:57:26.466+0000)
>
> Yes

Considering Support has been neglected VGUwise 50 bucks says it {{champion:37}} Sona or Janna{{champion:40}}  with Sona being slightly more likely than Janna just for having a lack of kit identity.

second guess would be Marksman VGU (which is really unlikely) but I would guess {{champion:133}} or {{champion:203}}  since those two champions have really interesting designs but such their gameplay is a absolute mess.
If it is any support it is likely Soraka, she was a tier one for VGU if I remember correctly.

> [{quoted}](name=Boomstick2055,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=000600060000,timestamp=2018-07-11T18:40:02.399+0000)
>
> If it is any support it is likely Soraka, she was a tier one for VGU if I remember correctly.

Soraka has up to date Visuals.
only her gameplay is aids.

> [{quoted}](name=Sunibee,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=00060006,timestamp=2018-07-11T11:51:33.659+0000)
>
> Considering Support has been neglected VGUwise 50 bucks says it {{champion:37}} Sona or Janna{{champion:40}}  with Sona being slightly more likely than Janna just for having a lack of kit identity.
> 
> second guess would be Marksman VGU (which is really unlikely) but I would guess {{champion:133}} or {{champion:203}}  since those two champions have really interesting designs but such their gameplay is a absolute mess.

Sona has a very strong kit identity, no other champion in this game operates like she does. While I would love her to get a VGU (she's due for a very minor one, her kit _did_ get updated about 3-4 years ago), her kit doesn't need any kind of extensive work because she's not in an identity crisis like Karma.

> [{quoted}](name=Sunibee,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=00060006,timestamp=2018-07-11T11:51:33.659+0000)
>
> Considering Support has been neglected VGUwise 50 bucks says it {{champion:37}} Sona or Janna{{champion:40}}  with Sona being slightly more likely than Janna just for having a lack of kit identity.
> 
> second guess would be Marksman VGU (which is really unlikely) but I would guess {{champion:133}} or {{champion:203}}  since those two champions have really interesting designs but such their gameplay is a absolute mess.

Wtf are you talking about? Kindred don't have a messy gameplay style. Infact if you get fed enough on them you could 1v5 the enemy team.

Hi Reav3, will you talk about SolCrushed new champion in your next champion roadmap? and will be there some teasers showcasing another VGU past these 2 that you comfirmed that you will talk about in the roadmap?

Y is the 25th letter of the alphabet
E is the 5th letter of the alphabet
S is the 19th letter of the alphabet

25+5+19=49

4+9=13

1+3=4

There are currently 16 champions confirmed for VGUs

16/4 = 4

Alphabetically, the 4th champion confirmed for a VGU is Fiddlesticks, it's Fiddlesticks.

> Yes

Is there ever gonna be support item changes to keep up with all this?

Reav3! Please rescheduled the release date of the next road map to an earlier date, please!, it makes me crazy already. please let it be after Akali's release in the PBE and if possible, please reveal a date for it :(
{{champion:36}} Big daddy Mundo
{{champion:81}}

Don't worry, especially Malphite :)
Kayle (with a smaller Morgana update that is mostly visual), a small scale Ezreal VGU, and at least one as-yet-unannounced project.

Ezreal is not confirmed for any vgu, only "small changes".

That could be anywhere from a new model, a small gameplay tweak, to a vo.

While it could be a vgu do not act like its confirmed.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-07-11T21:09:57.749+0000)

> 
> While it could be a vgu do not act like its confirmed.

nope, leaked from China, visual update with presumably new W and maybe new passive, numbers changes, etc etc... quite sure that Reinboom's working on it.
Care to show where?

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=sAcPR4op,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-12T05:34:22.139+0000)
>
> Care to show where?

https://reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/8v11gz/ezreal_will_receive_a_small_update/

"Ezreal will recieve a small update."

Thats what was said.

There has been no confirmation as to what is getting updated.

My guess is a {{champion:10}} + Minor {{champion:25}} update is very, very close.
{{champion:81}} was confirmed on a Chinese stream for a smaller, Aatrox level rework (just not changing his kit that much)
What I really think is that sometime in the fall, maybe November or October, we'll finally get our {{champion:82}}, as that's always the time Riot likes to release some spooky shit (Kallista in November 2014, Yorick Rework in October and Evelynn Rework in September 2017)

Ezreal was _not_ confirmed for any vgu.

It was stated there would be some "small changes".

Kinda doubt that Mordekaiser gets a VGU this year if the rest of your predictions is true.

Because we usually get one big release per month(with a total of 11 big releases in the year),so if we'd get Akali for july,Nunu for august,a new champ for september(pretty sure we'll get at least one more),Ezreal for october and then Kayle&Morgana for november&december.

So unless they ramped up the release schedule a bit more I'd say thats about it for this year.

I doubt it. Just made a post similar to this about an hour ago. Honestly I suspect it will be someone like Mundo, Fiddlesticks, or Mordekaiser. I know Morgana and Kayle are both on the list, but I think we already know it’s not them that are next, I think. Although it could be Kennen cause he is in need of a rework and what better of a time to do that than after Akali?

These guys are teir one so itll probs be someone in this list.
